title: SOUTHWEST SWEET POTATO, BLACK BEAN, WILD RICE SALAD
directions: Whisk together all of the ingredients for the dressing and set aside.
In a large bowl combine all of the salad ingredients
Pour the dressing over the salad and toss to combine.
Season with more salt and pepper if needed then serve or cover and refrigerate until ready to serve.
ingredients: 15 ounce can black beans, rinsed and drained
2 teaspoons honey or agave nectar for vegan
kosher salt and fresh ground black pepper to taste
